content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetCertificateSites path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/certificates/{certificate_id}/sites content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name certificateid
desc a certificate id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get sites associated with a certificate
responses
200
cdngetcertificatesitesresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
cdnsite
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a cdn sites unique identifier
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack to which a cdn site belongs
label
type str
desc a cdn sites name

site names correspond to their fullyqualified domain name
status
type str
desc a cdn sites internal state

site status is controlled by stackpath as sites are provisioned and managed by stackpaths accounting and security teams
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date that a cdn site was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date that a cdn site was last updated
features
type arr
cdnsitefeature
type str
default unknown
desc the features available to cdn sites

multiple products can be served on a single cdn site features control how those products are managed on the stackpath backend

  unknown stackpath is unable to determine a sites feature
  cdn a site has cdn caching abilities
  waf a site is protected by the stackpath web application firewall
desc a cdn sites associated features

features control how stackpath provisions and configures a site
enabled
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a sites cdn service is enabled
sitetypevalue
type str
default unknown
desc a cdn sites type

a sites type determines how stackpath delivers content to incoming https requests

  unknown stackpath is unable to determine a sites type
  cdn a site is cdn only site
  waf a site is either a standalone waf site or a waf site with attached cdn service
  api a site is an api delivery site api delivery sites are powered by both the waf and cdn and have custom rulesets for each
desc a cdn site
desc the requested cdn sites
desc the response from a request to retrieve cdn sites associated with an ssl certificate
title: 23_SSL_GetCertificateSites_133.json
